name: Botanic Heaven / Botanic Havoc
description:
***

So this is awkward. There's a minor, but game-breaking last minute bug. We accept that we're not really in the running for the game itself, but whoever is still interested, can DL the fixed version here ;)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-sLSnq-k_eHP79vDs8lOBgrQ04AMePm_/view?usp=sharing

***

WHAT IS IT ABOUT?

Botanic Heaven / Botanic Havoc is a game which was developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The overall theme is "Out Of Control". 
You are playing Mr. Mew, a cat scientist, who is trying to regain control over his overgrowing garden.  

The highlight's the panic that ensues when you let the garden grow out of control.

OUR TEAM

Marvin Müller "Fortytwoish" (Programming)
https://www.artstation.com/fortytwoish 

Manuela Schrewe "Favrocious" (3D Modeling, Concept Art)
https://www.artstation.com/favrocious 

Regina Buschmeier "Rin" (Graphic Design, Concept Art)
https://www.artstation.com/reginabu
